channel.description: This article will guide you through the creation of your first backup with plakar. Installing plakar The first step is to install the software. At the time of this writing, we do not yet provide packages and plakar has to be installed manually: $ go install https://github.com/PlakarKorp/plakar/cmd/plakar@latest This will ensure that dependencies are installed and you should be able to verify the command is properly installed: $ plakar version v0.4.27-alpha $ Running the local agent To work efficiently, plakar requires each user to run a local agent that will provide caching among other things. If the agent is not running, the plakar CLI will operate in degraded mode as a safety net, but will disallow concurrent commands and wonâ€™t benefit from caching.
